getPSDEDQConditions.name: (ID) 等于(=) 网页请求上下文 discuss_topic

getPSDEDQConditions.condition:
EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `MEMBER` t11 
 WHERE 
 t1.`ID` = t11.`OWNER_ID`  AND  ( t11.`USER_ID` = #{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} ) )
getPSDEDQConditions.name: members
